Articles.Content: The day side of planets is too bright, things look washed out. Is there anyway to reduce brightness?
In the Prerelease version, there is something called "Ambient Light Levels" that might help.

Also try adjusting your monitor's brightness. Many monitors ship to the customer at 100% brightness, which can be anywhere between 2 to 4 times the recommended luminance - especially when you play at night and/or your room is not well lit. For example, I have mine set to 30%. Which setting is ideal for you depends on your individual monitor, room, and personal preference. Experiment and see what you like best - usually it takes about half a day or so to get used to a different brightness setting.
